file.title: Jakarta Commons HttpClient
file.description: Although the java.net package provides basic support for accessing resources via HTTP, it doesn't provide the full flexibility or functionality needed by many applications. The Jakarta Commons HttpClient component seeks to fill this void by providing an efficient, up-to-date, and feature-rich package implementing the client side of the most recent HTTP standards and recommendations.

file.title: XML Catalog Entity Resolver
file.description: Maps URIs to other URIs using the mechanisms defined by OASIS Catalog or XML Catalog. Mainly used for DTDs and character entity sets, but can be used for other resources too.
